document.heading: Healthy Hearts of Babies Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-20, the “Healthy Hearts of Babies Act of 2015,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-6. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 5, 2015, and June 2, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 17, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-90 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-20 became effective September 17, 2015.
